00030 using namespace RDK2::Geometry;
00031 
00032  void laserdata2avv(const LaserData& scan, int npoints, double maxDist, AVV&avv) {
00033     for(int a=0;a<(int)scan.points.size();a++) {
00034         int from = std::max(0, a-npoints);
00035         int to = std::min((int)scan.points.size()-1, a+npoints);
00036         
00037         Point2d center = scan.points[a].ppoint().getCartesian();
00038         std::vector<Point2d> points;        
00039         for(int i=from;i<=to;i++) {
00040             Point2d point = scan.points[i].ppoint().getCartesian();
00041             if( (center-point).abs() <= maxDist) points.push_back(point);
00042         }
00043         AppliedVector av;
00044         av.where = center;
00045         double error, rho;
00046         regression(points, av.theta, rho, error);
00047         av.weight = 1;
00048         avv.push_back(av);
00049     }
00050 }
00051 
00052 void LaserData::updateThetas()
00053 {
00054     double rayWidth = getRayWidth();
00055     for (size_t i = 0; i < points.size(); i++) points[i].theta = minTheta + i * rayWidth;
00056 }
00057 
00058 int LaserData::numValidPoints() const {
00059     int num=0;
00060     for(int a=0;a<(int)points.size();a++)
00061         if(points[a].reading != 0) num++;
00062     return num;
00063 }
00064 
00065 bool LaserData::raysEqualTo(const LaserData&ld) {
00066         if(points.size() != ld.points.size()) {
00067             return false;   
00068         }
00069         
00070         for(int a=0;a<(int)points.size();a++)
00071             if(points[a].reading != ld.points[a].reading)
00072                 return false;
00073         
00074         return true;
00075     }
00076 
00077 bool LaserData::isInsideClearArea(Point2d world) const {
00078     Point2od o = add(estimatedPose, laserPose);
00079     Point2d relative = (world-o).rot(-o.theta);
00080     double reading = relative.abs();
00081     if(reading<0.01) return false;
00082     double theta = norm2PIX(relative.theta());
00083     int ray = (int)((theta-minTheta) / (maxTheta-minTheta) * points.size());
00084     if(ray<0 || ray >= (int)points.size()) 
00085         return false;
00086     return points[ray].reading > reading && reading > minReading;
00087 }
00088 
00089 
00091 double LaserData::minRange() const {
00092     bool set = false;
00093     double result = 1000;
00094     for(size_t a=0;a<points.size();a++) {
00095         if(points[a].reading<0) continue;
00096         if(!set) { result = points[a].reading; set = true;}
00097         result = std::min(result, points[a].reading);
00098     }
00099     return result;
00100 }
00101 
00102 int LaserData::getMinAngle()
00103 {
00104     bool set = false;
00105     double min_ang = 1000;
00106     double result = 1000;
00107     for(size_t a=0;a<points.size();a++) {
00108         if(points[a].reading<0) continue;
00109         if(!set) { result = points[a].reading; set = true;}
00110         if (points[a].reading < result)
00111             min_ang=points[a].theta;
00112     }
00113     return min_ang;
00114     
00115 }
00116 
00117 void LaserData::copy(const LaserData&l) {
00118     laserPose = l.laserPose;
00119     minReading = l.minReading;
00120     maxReading = l.maxReading;
00121     minTheta = l.minTheta;
00122     maxTheta = l.maxTheta;
00123     odometryPose = l.odometryPose;
00124     estimatedPose = l.estimatedPose;
00125     
00126     for(int a=0;a<(int)l.points.size();a++) {
00127         LaserPoint lp;
00128         lp.reading = l.points[a].reading;
00129         lp.theta = l.points[a].theta;
00130         lp.intensity= l.points[a].intensity;
00131         lp.trueAlpha= l.points[a].trueAlpha;
00132         
00133         points.push_back(lp);
00134     }
00135     
00136     tag=l.tag;
00137     timestamp=l.timestamp;
00138     ipc_hostname=l.ipc_hostname;
00139     ipc_timestamp=l.ipc_timestamp;
00140 }
00141 
00142 void LaserData::mm2m() {
00143     laserPose = RDK2::Geometry::mm2m(laserPose);
00144     minReading = RDK2::Geometry::mm2m(minReading);
00145     maxReading = RDK2::Geometry::mm2m(maxReading);
00146     odometryPose = RDK2::Geometry::mm2m(odometryPose);
00147     estimatedPose = RDK2::Geometry::mm2m(estimatedPose);
00148     for(int a=0;a<(int)points.size();a++)
00149         points[a].reading = RDK2::Geometry::mm2m(points[a].reading);
00150 }
